```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)   
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyr)
library(gganimate)
```


Column {data-width=500}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Gráfico

```{r}

tabela <- read_csv("Linguagens_Mais_Populares.csv")

tabela <- pivot_longer(tabela, 2:29, names_to = "Linguagens", values_to = "Percentual")

datas <- my(tabela$Date)

ggplot(tabela) +
  aes(
    x = datas,
    y = Percentual,
    color = Linguagens) + 
  geom_line()

```


Column {data-width=500}
----

### Grafico 2

```{r}

tabela %>% 
  group_by(Linguagens) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Linguagens, y = Percentual)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  coord_flip()

```
